text.en_US: Uhm...\. anyway...\. Let's just go, okay?
Sorry.\. He spotted you as you left.
Uhm, hello!\. I'm C'tron.\. I suppose you know each other?
I see you got yourself another party member, Spheromancer!
Anyway!\. I'm glad to see you progressed this far into the game!
It is due time to put your skills to another test!
Blue-haired Spheromancer!\. I challenge you to another \c[3]duel\c[0]!
Come on, Lea!\. His derrière deserves another beating!
Come on, Lea!\. It's your chance to get your revenge!
What is it?\. You seem less eager this time.
Is this important to you?\. Well then.
Accept the duel!\. If you earn my respect, I might call you by your name!
Let's meet in front of the Faj'ro Temple!
I'll be expecting you.\. Make sure to be well prepared!
Oh bother.\. Sometimes I wonder why I keep up with this oddball.
Oh.\. He's some kind of self proclaimed Justice guy.
I see.\. What a...\. unique character.
Anyway!\. It's time for a party of three!
Let's wrap up that quest already so we can finally go to Faj'ro Temple!
Agreed!\. I guess next we should report to the Eldress, right?
I do think so, Monsieur Tronny!
It's finally time to complete the \c[3]Maroon Tree Defender\c[0] quest together with Emilie and C'tron!
I wonder if we ever get to fight those huge space birds.
Eh...\. I haven't heard of that, yet.
So this is your first time playing CrossWorlds, too?
Pretty much. But I know some people who've played longer.
Oh, like the other guild members?
Ah, no. Not them. I don't know them personally.
I just joined the First Scholars because they seemed like fun.
I like that they're not all about the gameplay.\. It's funny how Hlin tries to get the most out of the lore and all.
Man, I can't wait to reach the level of Lukas and the others.
Then we can do all kinds of guild events!\. Raids and all that!
Oh yes, that does sound like fun!
You've got to beat your name into this guy's head already, Lea!
You should make sure you're well prepared.
You know...\. solve some quests, upgrade your equipment and all that.
You are free to change your party as you please now.
Meet \c[3]Apollo\c[0] for the duel in front of \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0]!
Just some goofy looking guy with a wood leg.
He wanted to give me something.
But I think it's a trap.
Come on, don't be such a chicken!
Well, if you want it so bad, why don't you go?
Well, what if it is a trap...
Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Arid Breeze is always welcoming of guests.
\v[lore.title.seeker], be our guest!\. There is much to talk about, I am sure.
I greet you, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The proud explorers of the Arid Breeze are honored by your visit.
My name is Jonathan Lorenzo Mahir el Valente Al-Nassar, the leader of our company of braves.
Don't worry, to my friends I am just Joel Mahir.\. And everyone is a friend to me, especially a pretty \v[lore.title.seeker] like yourself.
It would please me to listen to the story of your exploits, \v[lore.title.seeker], but first we must water our accomplishments.
See, a place of great importance in Ancient society is almost in our reach.\. After all these years of searching!
And we know of the final piece that would complete this puzzle... it must only be collected now!
So, young \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Do you want to claim that honor?
Splendid!\. With a \v[lore.title.seeker] like you by our side, I can almost taste the juices of success!
The object we need is a stone tablet with Ancient inscriptions and a map of the area in the old times.
However, it has been claimed by a pack of dastardly \v[combat.name.heat/drillertoise]s!
Worse, they are of the stubborn and cowardly kind.\. They will just hide under their rocks and never move.
But fret not, for we have requested a mobile explosion dispenser from our friends in Bergen.
With that apparatus you will be able to clear out their cave and claim the tablet!
We will prepare some of our best tea for your return.
No?\. That is a shock.\. I would not have expected you to deny this humble request.
Find the cave of those cowardly turtles!\. It is at the northern entrance of the Maroon Oasis.
Once inside, activate the mining machine to clear the way and dispose of those creatures.
\v[lore.title.seeker], you have returned to us.\. And that smile on your lips speaks of your success, does it not?
Ah, astonishing.\. This is truly Ancient work.
For even something as mundane as a travel guide to display such elegance. Magnificent!
I can hardly wait to finally feast my eyes on the main course.\. I hope we can count on you again when the time comes!
Ah, it is our lovely friend \v[lore.title.seeker] again, filling our presence with joy!
And that you are returning in this time of discovery is truly good fortune.\. The winds are on our side!
We have inspected that precious artifact you found on your last adventure and found hints to a holy place.
How about it, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Are you ready to claim the fruits of our work?
Yes, of course you want to!\. What could be more exciting?
Hira, one of our most able explorers, has pinpointed the location of the entrance to a small area.
Meet up with her at Torn Road in \v[area.heat-area.name].\. She will explain the details.
No, truly?\. But how could you resist, with exploration being so close?
Meet our explorer Hira on the Torn Road in \v[area.heat-area.name].
She will help your find the Entrance.
\v[lore.title.seeker], welcome back!\. Word of your latest exploits already reached us!
You have made great progress.\. And there is still more to discover, oh the excitement!
The result couldn't be better.\. Because, what is life without another goal to strive for?
Now Hira will continue excavating the place to find a way to go even deeper.
We will keep a spot for you on the next expedition!
\v[lore.title.seeker], be our guest!\. There is much to talk about, I am sure.
Move along, nothing to see here.
Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Take a seat and listen to the latest town gossip.
Ah, a \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Always nice to see fresh faces in this dusty ol' town.
Come, join this old man and his array of local blabbermouths.
Ba'kii Kum might be small, but it is a good place.\. Full of harmony and friendly coexistence.
Old human forgetting much theft happen on our markets.\. Very disrespect.
Ah, of course.\. Some silly hotheads still can't seem to appreciate the merits of our cooperation.
And my guards, they always see nothing.\. It hurts to think of them as unreliable, when they should inspire trust.
But grey human!\. There is \v[lore.title.seeker] here, to deliver great justice!\. She could help!
Mh, indeed.\. She could.\. But remember, they are very busy folk!
So, \v[lore.title.seeker]... could you spare some time on helping our Shad friends?
Ah, young folks being so helpful, it warms this old heart.
The crimes against shadkind usually happen at the bazaar in the town-center.
You should talk to a few resident citizens and guards.\. They might tell you in detail what happened recently.
Best start with Billston, the Chief Guard of the current shift. He should be at the center of the bazaar.
Ah, that is a shame.\. You might indeed have bigger fish to fry.
But we will still be here, whenever you change your mind.
Go to the center of town and talk to citizens and guards.\. They might tell you what is going on.
Best start with Billston, the Chief Guard of the current shift. He should be at the center of the bazaar.
\v[lore.title.seeker], welcome back!\. We just had a troubled young man confess his crime.
He certainly did bad things, but he came clean, so I don't think we need to punish him too much.
The other things he said though... it makes me sad that a bad fruit like Billston was just among us.
I should have been more vigilant.\. Maybe this old man has become too soft with age.
Aw, no!\. Old human is bestest of protector!
Yes!\. Preserving great peace for shad and humens!
Shucks, you are too kind with this rusty soldier.\. But you are right, we should just look forward!
Thank you for your help, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Billston is still at large but his crimes should stop for now.
I hope we can count on your help again, in case more trouble arises.\. Goodbye!
Young \v[lore.title.seeker], you found your way back to us?\. How swell!
I am sure you are still worried about the traitor Billston being at large.
But now we do finally have hints of his whereabouts!
Can we count on you again, to finally bring that scoundrel to justice?
You really are a treasure, young one!
According to reports reaching us, Billston has left the city and hides somewhere in \v[area.heat-area.name].
There, he sometimes robs Shad traders of their money and goods, before hiding again.
Though he should not be far from the settlement, since he should still need water and human supplies on a regular basis.
So, if you want to find him, you should start patrolling the main route through the desert from here!
Splendid!\. It is reassuring to have you helping us again.\. Godspeed, young \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Oh, I thought you couldn't wait to finally catch him.\. But maybe you just want to prepare a bit more?
The traitor Billston should be somewhere on the main route through \v[area.heat-area.name].
He should still need regular supplies, so best start searching near the settlement.
Ah, once again our hero has returned!\.
Yes, you have done well.\. Billston was apprehended and led to a secure prison cell.
He will cause no more crimes against the unity of our species from now on.
Though, I do fear that he was not acting alone.\. There is still a lot of work to do for us.
But... for now we should celebrate the harmony of shad and humankind.\. And all the progress that has been made!
You should take your well earned reward.\. And know that you will always be welcome in our midst!
Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Take a seat and listen to the latest town gossip.
You have a rare talent at surprising me, kid!
It seems like I found myself at a dead end yet again.
It's another of those broken items I'm searching for my kids. A sword this time.
I have an actual lead this time, but I can't find the next clue.
I fear at this rate, it might be too late for me...
Would you be able to help an old man?
You don't know how much this means to me at this point.
Ah it matters not, let's get right to the point.
This time, a broken item is hidden somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0].
There is a secret passage in the "south west" of the area.
But to unlock the passage you have to offers some sort of \c[3]Coin\c[0].
I don't know what exactly this coin is, but I found out that an NPC somewhere in this village has one.
It should be in one of the houses since I already talked to every NPC in the village.
Maybe it's somewhere higher up, or hidden?
At my age, jumping around on houses is a bit to much...
So this is where you could help me.
Alright! Talk to me again in case you forgot anything.
And don't keep an old man waiting, kid!
I understand, though I'm also disappointed. I expect you to help an old man.
Hello young lady, do you want me to tell you about the place again?
This time, a broken item is hidden somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0].
There is a secret passage in the "south west" of the area.
But to unlock the passage you have to offers some sort of \c[3]Coin\c[0].
I don't know what exactly this coin is, but I found out that an NPC somewhere in this village that has one.
It should be in one of the houses since I already talked to every NPC in the village.
I see, then off you go. Don't keep an old man waiting.
Welcome back kid, any luck finding the \c[3]Broken Sword\c[0]?
Mh... Yes, I think it is time I told you why I'm searching for these, right?
You've been a great help and it is only fair for you to know.
Even if I'm not a fan of telling other people about my problems.
You see, I played CrossWorlds with my kids since the game was in its testing phase.
I think they called it "Closed Beta" or something like that.
It was a fun time. I was able to spend time with all of my 5 children.
Everyone was off somewhere in the galaxy, so this game was the perfect meeting ground.
And we had a falling out...
...and now I'm trying to find these broken items to fix things. Ironic, right?
My kids always told me this story of a hidden quest where every class needs to participate.
You find some broken equipment and bring it to a special place.
But we could never actually find it.
It was only a couple of weeks ago that i started hearing rumors.
And thanks to you, I found 3 of the 5 broken items in a couple of days.
I can't thank you enough, Lea!
Well, it looks like it is time for me to go.
I hope we meet again soon, I'm sure you are as motivated as I am to find the last 2 broken pieces.
Have a good day, young lady. Goodbye.
Oy Lady. Can I interest you in a rare trinket?
One that surely bring you nothing but good fortune, I swear!
I wonder what the coin does...
A coin is sometimes used as a fee for something.
... are you sure this is about the book?
...because you could just take the book and get off the table.
We're literally surrounded by couches and cushions!
Sorry, I'm just totally immersed in this book right now!
I'm just looking at the info tables a bit.
Mostly offerings from other players to team up and stuff.
But from time to time you find a neat little lore tidbit using the \c[3]Seeker Senses\c[0].
Lamps and where to find them
I'm watching the advisor over there.
I want to find out how varied his responses actually are.
It's been disappointing so far. He really does just say the same thing over and over again.
Dear humans! Great Eldress is waiting upstairs!
She has an important story for you!
Human, are you willing to help us in exchange for \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0]?
Please take this \c[3]Pass\c[0]. Needed to enter cave below \c[3]Maroon Tree\c[0].
Shad understand. Please talk to us when you change mind.
Please defeat pesky \c[3]sandworms\c[0] in cave below \c[3]Maroon Tree\c[0].
We will give \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0] as reward. You need orb to enter \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0].
Dear Human! Did you defeat pesky sandworms below Maroon Tree?
Indeed, I see note on pass.
Thank you so much, human. Because of your help, tree will live many more years!
Now I'll hand you \c[3]shiny thing\c[0] for reward.
Human now can go to \c[3]mystic statue\c[0] at market to receive key to \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0].
We got the Shiny Orb, everyone!\. The pinnacle of creativity!
Well... it's the Shad.\. They prefer simple terminology, right?
Time to collect the \c[3]Yellow Sand Shade\c[0] from the statue in \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0].
Thank you human for helping Shad!
Tree will live many more years!
... If human still help us defeat sandworm for years to come.
You gotta thank the sandworms for helping us keep good diplomatic relations with the Shad.
Dear humans, I am Eldress of Ba'kii Kum.
You have my thanks for visiting our small, humble town of Shad.
For many years Humans and Shad have worked together.
We traded, we shared, we fought together.
So today Ba'kii Kum is town of Shad and Human.
We know that Humans want to learn about Ancients.
Ancients are Ancestors of us Shad - yet we still know little!
But we want to help Humans!
Ba'kii Kum is home of \c[3]mystic statue\c[0].
Statue holds key to \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0], important place for Seeker Human.
However, Statue only react if Human holds \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0].
We have \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0] and will give to Human.
In \c[3]East part of Maroon Valley\c[0] you find majestic \c[3]Maroon Tree\c[0].
Maroon Tree very important to Shad, but attacked by \c[3]Sandworms\c[0] of Track.
We ask Human to defeat pesky Sandworms in cave below Maroon Tree.
We will give \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0] for defeating Sandworms.
Human help Shad and Shad will help Human! Is a trade!
Please talk to me to accept task!
In name of all Shad, thank you for listening!
So we gotta save the tree! D'accord.
Sounds like a mandatory quest.\. Let's accept it!
Hey Lea, I want to check out the balcony!
There are no mistakes, just happy little accidents.
I can offer hardest steel to protect soft human body.
Hello, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Need some provisions on this hot day?
Oh, a \v[lore.title.seeker] wants to talk to me?\. I am sorry but I don't think we got any business right now.
Aww, don't give me that face.\. I'm sure we can talk later!
Hey there, lady.\. Anything I can help you with?
Kney'tehab sent you to me to test our new toy?\. That's amazing news!
Even finding a \v[lore.title.seeker] to help me.\. The boss can be such a sweetheart when he wants to!
See, we have found a way to implement a human device into locations flowing with Ancient energy.
Here we wired a distillery into a puzzle to brew ourselves some drinks in the way of the Ancients!
I know, right?!\. Drinks flowing with Ancient power must be the stuff!
I'm so excited I'd love to start right away!\. But we need a few materials first to get our baby running.
Here, take a list of the things.\. It's mostly ingredients from different places and some ice for the cooling.
Great!\. It will be worth it, I promise you!
Gather all the ingredients that we need for a test run.\. Oh, and some ice for the cooling!
Amazing, you really got everything!\. Now we can begin with the fun part.
Let me just prepare everything you need!
Alrighty, thats it.\. Here, take this and go down the stairs behind me to your right.
I will follow you and tell you how to get our precious machine running!
Go down the stairs behind me to your right.\. I will follow you and explain how it works!
Sorry, but I'm busy here.\. I'm sure you'll manage on your own.\. Don't forget that the console has an instruction!
Amazing job down there, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I already told the boss so he can prepare your reward!
Come back afterwards if you wanna brew more of the finest!
Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker], great to see you back!
We already tweaked our sweet lil' machine with the data of your tests.\. The stuff it produces is just the best!
We can open it up for you to use it on your own again, if you agree to give it some further tests!
Great!\. You will see that we have changed the way it works a bit.
You will now have a \c[3]limited amount of time\c[0] to refine those ingredients as much as possible!
Basically, to help us out you should just try to reach as much \c[3]quality\c[0] as you can.
That'll also \c[3]increase the number of drinks\c[0] produced, so it's win-win for everyone!
Thing is, reaching high qualities is tricky, because it's about maintaining a \c[3]high heat\c[0] without making mistakes.
Well, I'm sure you will get the hang of it.\. I will give you another batch of ingredients to start right away.
You can get more from my assistant down there, if you also bring the base materials.
What, seriously?\. But why wouldn't you?\. There's no pressure, really...
Try to get as much \c[3]quality\c[0] out of it as possible!\. Our data says that \c[3]maintaining high heat is key\c[0].
My assistant Bru down there can prepare more brewing sets if needed.
Wow, \v[lore.title.seeker], Those quality-ratings were just off the charts!\. Amazing work!
That'll really help us refine the mechanics.
Also, we worked on another recipe for you to use.\. You should try it out when you got the time!
Anyway, things are getting busy again.\. See you around, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Wanna get more drinks done?

text.en_US: Hey, there \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You got everything done here?

EventTrigger quest_brewingDone START IF tmp.brewing_won && timers.brewing-timer.remainingTime <= 0 && tmp.brewing_started

text.en_US: Alright!\. What do the numbers say, Bru?

EventTrigger quest_brewingDone START IF tmp.brewing_won && timers.brewing-timer.remainingTime <= 0 && tmp.brewing_started

text.en_US: Numbers say good quality of liquid goods.\. Seem \v[lore.title.seeker] done well!

desc: EventTrigger quest_brewingDone START IF tmp.brewing_won && timers.brewing-timer.remainingTime <= 0 && tmp.brewing_started

text.en_US: Great, it seems like everything went without a hitch!\. We will extract the product soon.

desc: EventTrigger quest_brewingDone START IF tmp.brewing_won && timers.brewing-timer.remainingTime <= 0 && tmp.brewing_started

text.en_US: I will notify the boss of your success, so you can go back to him and get your reward!

text.en_US: But you should definitely come back afterwards, so we can brew more of this fine stuff.\. Looking forward to it!

text.en_US:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker] welcome!\. Red-headed expert of the brew is coming down as well to give explain.
Alrighty, let's get this going, shall we?
Here we are!\. Now take a look at this!
Amazing, huh?\. Our partners in Bergen really outdid themselves with this beauty!
Not gonna go into technical details but it will brew us amazing drinks and infuse them with Ancient power!
If we prove ourselves worthy that is.\. You know how the Track works: No reward without trials.
I'm sure a \v[lore.title.seeker] like you will do just fine!\. So lemme explain...
After starting, the machine will \c[3]request energy\c[0] from one of those \c[3]steam-receivers\c[0].
You will need to put some \c[3]ice\c[0] in there quickly.\. At first you can use a \c[3]bubble generator\c[0] for that.
Later you will have to \c[3]catch waterbubbles\c[0] that the Track sends through those \c[3]pipes\c[0] from who knows where.
Oh, and you should also \c[3]throw some ice at the machine itself\c[0] once in a while.\. We don't want it \c[3]overheating\c[0], do we?
Well, and that's about it.\. You got everything?
Perfect!\. My assistant Bru will check the numbers while you are at work, but I'm sure you will do great!
I myself sadly can't watch you because I got business to attend to upstairs.\. So we'll talk again once it's finished, yes?
Alrighty, then lemme explain it again.
This is the machine that will create our wonderful, magic booze.\. If it is used correctly!

- Instruction to Ancient Brewing -
Quality drinks using the mystical powers of the Track, steam and only the best natural ingredients!
After activating this machine, it will request energy from the \c[3]4 steam ovens\c[0]. Those requests have to be met with \c[3]icedisks\c[0] quickly and correctly!
In the beginning a \c[3]static bubble generator\c[0] will be available, though later it will vanish. At this point, bubbles ejected from the \c[3]pipes left and right\c[0] have to be used.

Thanks to the immense powers flowing through it, the brewing machine will \c[3]overheat\c[0] with time. \c[3]Cooling it with ice\c[0] will be necessary to prevent \c[3]overheating\c[0] and a \c[3]time-consuming cooldown-phase\c[0].
\c[3]Not meeting a request\c[0], \c[3]putting ice in a wrong oven\c[0] or \c[3]overheating the machine\c[0] will damage the ingredients and \c[3]reduce the overall quality\c[0] of the product.
On the other hand, brewing \c[3]quality\c[0] will increase at a higher rate with \c[3]growing requests\c[0] and when maintaining a \c[3]high heat\c[0]!
The \c[3]higher the quality\c[0], the \c[3]more useable drinks\c[0] can be created from \c[3]the same amount of ingredients\c[0]!

\c[3]Not meeting a request\c[0], \c[3]putting ice in a wrong oven\c[0] or \c[3]overheating the machine\c[0] will do \c[3]damage\c[0] to the ingredients. With too much \c[3]damage\c[0], the brewing will \c[1]fail\c[0]!
\v[lore.title.seeker] impress Ancients for great liquids!\. I will keep eyes on numbers.
\v[lore.title.seeker] done well.\. Extracting goods will done soon.
\v[lore.title.seeker] talk to Ms. Ryda upstairs.\. Much progress is on the foot.
Wish much success.\. May Ancients bless precious liquids!
Wish much success.\. May Ancients bless precious liquids!
Wish much success.\. May Ancients bless precious liquids!

Your prolonged journey
brought you to this barren field.

Surrounded by boundless sand
I shall hand you the Shade of the same.

It will open the passage
to the \c[3]Temple of Faj'ro\c[0].

Traveler, envoy of change,
your next trial awaits you.
A data probe installed by a player for Henry.
A data probe installed by a player for Henry. The data has been retrieved.
I am terribly sorry to disturb your experience, but I have questions of the utmost importance.
My Name is \c[3]Baxton Addi\c[0]. I'm a moderator and supervisor for \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0]. May I ask for your name?
A lovely name. But let us get to the matter at hand, shall we?
I was just inspecting the area to ensure all was in proper order.
And I came across this object here.
Now, this peculiar little bugger does not show up in my database.
All Assets in the game world are to be registered to avoid any disturbance of player experience.
Now my humble assumption is that our asset team just missed adding these new items.
A common oversight, I regret to say.
Now all I need to know is, if you perhaps are involved in a quest that this object is a part of?
As I thought. This explains a lot. A report must still be made.
Thank you for your cooperation, Lady Lea. Farewell.
I'm really bad at these instanced challenges.
I will never let you have them.
A chest filled with cursed riches.

desc: EventTrigger Ctron Comment START IF tmp.ctronComment

text.en_US: Cave time! ... Wait, there's running water down here?

desc: EventTrigger Ctron Comment START IF tmp.ctronComment
EventTrigger Ctron Comment START IF tmp.ctronComment

text.en_US: That's... weird, considering there are lakes out there. You'd think everything would flood over.

desc: EventTrigger Ctron Comment START IF tmp.ctronComment

text.en_US: I suppose you could make it work by carefully crafting the area... somehow?

desc: EventTrigger Ctron Comment START IF tmp.ctronComment

text.en_US: What's up with that name anyway?

desc: EventTrigger ctronComment START IF map.barrier1 && map.barrier2

text.en_US: That should be all for this level, right?

desc: EventTrigger ctronComment START IF map.barrier1 && map.barrier2

text.en_US: By the way!\. Did you know that worms have five hearts?\. Like...\. real earth worms do.

desc: EventTrigger ctronComment START IF map.barrier1 && map.barrier2
EventTrigger ctronComment START IF map.barrier1 && map.barrier2

text.en_US: I mean...\. they are not quite as complex as human hearts, but still!

desc: EventTrigger ctronComment START IF map.barrier1 && map.barrier2
EventTrigger ctronComment START IF map.barrier1 && map.barrier2

text.en_US: Makes you wonder about the anatomy of those Sandworms.

desc: EventTrigger ctronComment START IF map.barrier1 && map.barrier2
EventTrigger ctronComment START IF map.barrier1 && map.barrier2

text.en_US: That must be the red sandworm, better be careful!
I suppose the \c[3]\v[item.362.name]\c[0] is the strange item the guard wants to see, right?
Oh, is that a direct link?
OH!\. You're the other member from the First Scholars, non?
Très bien!\. So you'll join our party, oui?
So where are you two right now?
Uhm...\. Lea and I are currently in the Maroon Tree Cave...
Wait!\. You started that quest already?
It looks like we almost finished it.
Aww man...\. I wanted to do that quest with you!
I-\.I'm sorry, I didn't know you had that planned.
Non, it's fine! Pas de problème!
I'll quickly rush through that quest myself!
You two just wait for me, d'accord?
Uhm...\. You mean I don't have to?\. W-\.Well...
Let's just go back to the cave entrance and show the item to the guard.
I think the cave interior is instanced, but we might be able to meet Emilie outside.

The everlasting sun 
shines strongest on these lands.

Its flaming glory bearing
life and death alike.

On this unforgiving path 
you stayed persistent.

With frozen sweeps and strokes
you crossed the scorching grounds.

You, the traveler, 
the envoy of change.

Take this Shade 
to open the path to the east.

Your resolve is evident
and deserving a gift of strength.

Let me add to your inner flame
to make its warmth long lasting.

Let your every step
form the path of your growth.
Blue-haired Spheromancer! You're not thinking about skipping the duel, right?
Are you ready for the race of the Faj'ro Temple?
Complete \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0] in the race against Emilie and C'tron.
D'accord, just don't let us wait for too long~
Hey Lea, we should call C'tron before entering the Temple.
Don't forget about our race, non?
Lea, what about Emilie? We wanted to race the dungeon together, right?
Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie and C'tron, right?
Hm...\. Your \c[3]stats seem rather low\c[0]. I suggest you upgrade your \c[3]circuits\c[0] and \c[3]equipment\c[0] before the duel.
Unless you are very confident in your skills. But I don't want to hear any excuses!
Are you ready for the duel?
Make sure to give Grasshead the beating of a lifetime.
Hey Lea, I think Tronny wanted to watch your match as well, non?
I'll quickly give him a call to come over!
Lea, I think Emilie wanted to see the match as well, right?
Let me just quickly call her!
Lea, I think C'tron and Emilie wanted to watch your match as well, right?
Just give them a hint via D-Link.
It's duel time! Good thing you didn't forget about us!
It's duel time! Good thing you didn't forget about me.
Gosh...\. I almost missed it.\. Thanks for telling me!
Inviting your friend to watch the duel, Spheromancer?
Time has passed since our last duel.
Our characters have grown.\. We both acquired the \c[3]heat element\c[0].
So it is time for me, \c[3]Apollo\c[0], to make sure you are still on the right path.

The path of a 
proper Spheromancer!\.
Mon dieu, start the duel already!
Not bad. But that was just a "warm up". Things are getting \c[3]hot\c[0] now!
Did you seriously just make that pun?
Let's see if you can handle my \c[3]secret strategy\c[0]!
Alright, fun time is over now.
You almost got it, Lea! Go, go, go!
I won't let you win this easily!
I know you can do better.
Come on, Lea! More punching! You can do it!
You still have much to learn!
You've grown remarkably. I'm very impressed, Spheromancer!
You deserve to be called by your proper name now.
It looks like you still have much to learn, Blue-Haired Spheromancer.
You still won't use her name? Don't be like that.
It was a good duel and a respectable effort on your end.
I suppose I might as well use your proper name.
Spheromancer Lea! I'm looking forward to our next duel!
Does that mean we can finally play this game together like we'd originally planned?
Yes, sorry I made you wait.
Oui! You've shown Grasshead who's boss! Good work!
That was a good fight, Lea.\. You tried your best.
Oui.\. Just make sure to punch Grasshead even harder next time!
Well then...\. Our next stage would be \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0], right?
It's time for our third dungeon race!
Oh, you two are racing dungeons together?
That's right! We've been racing dungeons ever since we met at Newcomer's Bridge.
Then again, I guess there is no place for me in your competition...
What do you mean, Tronny? Of course you can race with us!
The more the merrier, right Lea?
Now if that's the case! Don't mind me joining, then!
Fantastique! Now I really can't wait!
Hm.. maybe Lea wants a short breather after the duel?
Ah oui... just tell us when you're ready!
Enter \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0] to start the next dungeon race again Emilie and C'tron!
Once again, the location is just perfect!
Again seeking the attention of other players, oui?
Are you sure?\. With all those players around?
He wants his audience. You can't talk him out of it, trust me.
Anyway!\. Talk to me, when you are ready for the duel!
Hey Lea! You're here as well? I just arrived myself.
... But this is not the end of the dungeon, oui?
No, this seems to be more like a break room in the middle?
Phew... that means the race isn't over yet!
Oh, you're here as well already?\. Tronny and me just arrived before.
And he even arrived before me, can you believe this?
Anyway, this is not the end of the dungeon, just the middle.
But man... this dungeon sure is full of puzzles.
I mean we could take a break. There is a landmark here, after all.
We'll leave it up to you, Lea. Just enter the dungeon when you want to continue the race.
Why... are they doing this to me...?
Anyway...\. Got that over and done with.
But hey! Despite all these HORRIFYING experiences... I'm still first!
That's surprising! You've been so fast before.
I had a pretty hard time with those fire golems.
Yes...\. Also that boss. I mean...\. how are you holding up, Emilie?
Anyway, it was a fun race!
Now it's time to collect the reward, right?
That space bird was especially awesome!\. Loved that flaming sword!
Makes sense. She's the symbol for heat and fire, right?
Just look at this place! It's beautiful!
So much better than that gloomy cave we had last time.
Come on! I want to have a look down from over there!
Talk to \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the southern end of Faj'ro Temple Roof.
At first the world was dark. Hence, \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] and \c[3]E'nel\c[0] created the first sun to spread light.
Yet at night, when the sun was hidden, the world was as dark as ever.
\c[3]E'nel\c[0] wanted to place many more suns close by, creating a world of constant brightness.
Yet this world was monotonous, lacking dusk, dawn and the coolness of the night.
The two gods then had a new idea. They created millions upon millions of new suns far far away in all directions.
Thanks to \c[3]E'nel\c[0] and \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] efforts we can today enjoy the night with a beautiful starry sky.
Not only are the stars beautiful, \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] placed them in particular to stir our curiosity for other worlds out there.
After \c[3]E'nel\c[0] created millions of suns, she craved for a challenge.
She wanted to create the largest, most majestic sun imaginable.
Thus, she started adding her eternal flame, adding more and more as the sun grew further and further.
Until finally, the sun had too much fire and couldn't hold it any longer. What followed was a most spectacular and colorful explosion.
Even today, we very rarely witness these colorful explosions in the night sky as a testament of E'nel's boredom.
It all started when \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], the ethereal god of creation, was born into the emptiness of the void.
After pondering for eons in solitude, his desire for company gave birth to the \c[3]Gods of Shape\c[0].
E'nel is one of these gods. The God of the \c[3]Triangle\c[0] and the creator of \c[3]ever-burning flames\c[0].
E'nel is the creator of \c[3]ever-burning flames\c[0].
She made the sun with \c[3]blinding light\c[0] and filled the ground deep beneath our feet with a \c[3]molten stone\c[0].
Her creations spread warmth, yet consume life at the same time.
Hey Lea, do you want to leave already?
Come on, you should at least have a short look!
It's astonishing just thinking how huge this place is.
Oui. And all that for a game.
Well then... it was great playing with you two.
But I'm afraid it's time for me to log off now. I have to get back to my studies.
What are you studying anyway, Tronny? Biology?
Talking about these things! I was wondering for a long time now...
Lea? What do you actually do?
We've been playing for so long and I still hardly know anything about you...
I know you're very quiet and all... but I'd really like to know a bit more about you.
You do know about her speech synchronization issue, right?
Since... all the time I think?
Y-You're joking right?\. I mean you hear her say things sometimes, right?
She can only say certain words, that's all.
Wait. Do the other guild members know, too?
Why the hell didn't anybody tell me?!
I...\. I honestly thought you knew...
It's not like Lea could have told you...
I just thought you're the quiet type... That you just didn't like to talk much...
But honestly, everybody else knew it...?
Man, this makes me feel dumb.
I'm sure it's just a stupid coincidence!
Though, I'm preeetty sure Lukas could have told me...
Oui, I'll have a little talk with him soon.
Anyway, this is a bit of a bummer.
I wanted to know you better... and now you can't talk.
Oh well! I'll make sure to prepare a sufficient list of yes-no-questions for next time!
Anyway, I really gotta go! Au revoir, everyone!
Yes! Same for me. Good bye and until next time!
Emilie finally figured it out, huh?
I still cannot believe she managed to stay oblivious when the rest of the First Scholars learned about it.
You really need just the right conditions for something like this to happen.
I suppose it was a pretty long day...
There is something I have to tell you.
And as a result you have been \c[3]offline for 3 days\c[0] now.
Sorry, there was not much I could do about it.
Do not worry, things are still fine with you Lea... given the circumstances.
There have just been some... technical problems.
Oh, but I also have some good news for you!
I used that time to add a new word for you, Lea.
To be honest it becomes increasingly difficult for me to add more words for you, Lea...
I am afraid things might break if I just keep doing things this way.
Uhm... I mean in your Avatar connection software.
Also I keep backups, just in case. No need to worry.
Anyway, I thought "Wait" might be useful to tell others to... well... wait.
Like when there is something you want to tell them.
For instance: when you happen to remember something, you can tell me by saying "Wait", right?
Ah! You mean you DO remember something?
Great! Let me see... is it a person?
Okay! Was it a place you have not yet reached in the game?
Interesting...\. Now, how can we further narrow this down...?
Oh! I assume that must be Emilie or C'tron?
Finally! Where have you been the last few days?
Whatever! We got great news for you!
I'm here with Tronny in \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0]! You know, at the fountain!
You should come over! So much stuff happened here!
Heh... seems like you have been missed already.
Well... let us discuss your dream another time.
There is no reason to rush it. Just go and meet the others!
Meet \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the fountain of \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0].
See, I told you the lilies were safe.
You need \c[3]Pass from Eldress\c[0] if you want to enter Cave.
You find Eldress in \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], Shad village to the \c[3]west\c[0]!
You need \c[3]Pass from Eldress\c[0] if you want to enter Cave.
Hey Lea, do you want to tackle the Maroon Tree Quest by yourself now?
I thought you wanted to meet \c[3]C'tron\c[0] north of \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]?
You forgot? Better don't let the poor guy wait for too long.
You need \c[3]Pass from Eldress\c[0] if you want to enter Cave.
Oh! Is that the pass?\. So Human must be here to help \c[3]defeat Sandworm\c[0]!
Then please enter Cave and defeat all Sandworm!
There is very strong \c[3]red sandworm\c[0] in cave!
Please defeat that worm! Most important, because very dangerous to tree!
Red Sandworm will also drop \c[3]strange item\c[0]! Show me item to prove you defeated red sandworm, ok?
Human very nice, always helping us defeating Sandworm!
But Sandworm always coming back, very pesky!
Anyway, together we can protect tree!
I see you have strange item!\. Please give me!
Strange item very good for Maroon Tree!\. Putting in earth helps to grow!
Wait...\. so I guess that stuff was...\. dung?
Good thing we got rid of it.
I make note for Eldress!\. You can now go and get \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0]!
Hi Emilie, it's nice to finally meet you!
Oui!\. Nice to meet you, too!
And again...\. I'm sorry we didn't wait for you.
No really, it's fine.\. We never made any plans, anyway.
And I can understand why you'd play ahead.\. I've been offline for quite some time.
It's just that...\. I really had to wrap up everything for that project.
Gosh...\. Studies keeping you busy, huh?
Oui, oui.\. And you don't even know half of the story yet, isn't that right, Lea?
Anyway, work is over now and I've got plenty of free time! I'm so ready!!
I'll try my best to beat that cave as quickly as possible.
No rush! I suggest we meet in \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] in front of the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] once you're done.\. Sounds good?
Oui, très bien! See you soon!
Wow, she sure is full of energy!
Anyway! There is no reason to hurry, but I guess we can slowly head back to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], right?
You decided to meet up with Emilie in front of the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] of \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0].
Human very nice, always helping us defeating Sandworm!
But Sandworm always coming back, very pesky!
Anyway, together we can protect tree!
Phew, it's hotter'n blazes here, tell you what.
But the flora's quite a sight, ain't it?
Well, how 'bout y'all? Explorin' comin' along?
Glad ta hear it. Y'all be good now!
Good thing we found this spot. Why is it so hot?
Yeah! First freezing cold and now this?
I don't know what you mean guys. I like the hot weather here.
You probably turned down the temperature sense.
Nope, I just really like the heat.
And after that freezing cold in \v[area.bergen.name] the heat is very welcome.
Well that's easy for you to say. I'm already sweating...
Aw come on, you could just turn off the simulation of heat.
But I don't want to break the immersion...
But this is just... too hot. I might have to.
Think about it, if we could make such a device...
We would need to canvas all areas and distribute them to the Seekers.
Let's bring this up when we meet the boss later.
I'm pretty glad that we get a breather after the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0].
But I can already see new enemies beyond this ravine.
I just hope they act as cute as they look.
You entered \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0], hot-sandy desert and home of us \c[3]Shad\c[0]!
You should visit \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], bustling town of Shad!
Has big bazaar with great offers!
Human want to know more? Talk to me!
I'd really like to join your party right now...\. if you are okay with that.
Très bien!\. Did you just enter Maroon Valley by any chance?
Okay, I'll be there in a second!
Did that birdman over there talk to you as well?
He does that with any new player that stands around for too long, non?
I was surprised to meet a non-human race after all!
Anyway, we should head to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], right? Sounds like the next big town.
Travel to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] together with Emilie.
Human, want to know way to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]?
Easy! Human just follow this way to \c[3]west\c[0].
You shortly need to turn \c[3]south\c[0], then go \c[3]west\c[0] again and follow way below \c[3]arcs of rock\c[0]!
You then need to turn \c[3]north\c[0] to reach deep abyss. Use rocks to jump over it.
Afterwards you need to turn \c[3]west\c[0] again and you will reach \c[3]Great Scar\c[0]. Amazing view to \c[3]Hourglass Building\c[0].
Human continue \c[3]west\c[0] and will soon reach \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]!
Human look confused! No problem, \c[3]just follow signposts\c[0].
They will point way to Ba'kii Kum!
Okay! I'm here if human has question!

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: Man...\. we played so long yesterday, non?

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320
EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: I barely got any sleep last night.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320
EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: In c-c-case you forgot what the p-probe looks like...
It looks the same as the o-o-ones next to m-me.
Are you f-finished with the s-s-survey?
This is almost done, one more and I will have them all.
It seems that they use a smart system to provide content.
Maybe an AI that decides what to spawn, based on player interaction?
Yes, yes that seems plausible. I just have to analyze all the data and I'm good. Nothing can stop me.
I will get that promotion and never have to work in the field again! Hehehe.
O-oh. I'm so... so... S-Sorry. I just... get excited sometimes.
D-Don't worry about it, you did your p-part just fine.
T-Take this! I have to be somewhere else.
H-Hey Lea! Thanks again for h-h-helping me out.
I guess I need h-help yet again.
I j-j-just left another p-player with the task to place a p-probe.
Someone just came and asked, funny looking guy.
But I don't care as long as the job gets done, since I need the data.
Oh... W-w-wait. Sorry, I got c-carried away.
A-Anyway... \.\.\. W-Would you like to h-help again?
The t-t-tasks are the same as last time!
I-I want to gather some d-data for \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0] this time.
I-It's a rural area, but I need the survey data.
Here, a-another c-c-compiled list for you...
Some enemy scouting, local flora and the landmarks again.
And of course a probe... I asked another player to place it in a cave.
The problem is that I don't know where it is...
I think it was some cave here in the valley. Guess you have to check them all.
T-Thanks, please come back once you're d-d-done.
A-and in case you forgot what the p-probe looks like...
It looks the same as the o-o-one next to m-me.

text.en_US: So I'm in this course that gives out team assignments, right?

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: Oui... and today I had a bit of trouble with all of that...

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: And everyone was supposed to do their task before then.

Please find items quickly, so we can return to town!

desc: EventTrigger FAIL-shitEventThatSucks START IF false && (tmp.quest_traders-sharkKill-1-1 || tmp.quest_traders-sharkKill-1-2 || tmp.quest_traders-sharkKill-1-3)

text.en_US: Ah, please no eat scaly Shad.\.
Oh dummy!\. Open eyes, it not a monster.\. It human!
Oh.\. Yes, that true.\. Such danger here, not good for Shad nerves.
Ignore big baby.\. Is human here to help?\. Us could need help with great problem.
Sent by Bazaarboss itself?\. Such kindness, he thinking of workers!
He more think of precious cargo, me think.\. No matter, help is help!
\v[lore.title.seeker], look at transportation platform behind us.
It fine human technology, helped us move much crates.\. But now it broke.
Yes, shield still work, so no monsters eat precious cargo.\. But floaty device not work anymore.
Meaning we stuck like rock.\. And need materials for repair. Like \c[3]\v[item.190.name]\c[0] from city.
Also \c[3]\v[item.186.name]\c[0]!\. And \c[3]\v[item.177.name]\c[0]!\. Both found in desert, if hit plants!
Yes, but different plants, not forget!\. And that it.
Good news!\. Please hurry and help us move again.
Yes, we wait and guard crate.\. And try not be eaten.
You got needed materials?\. It splendid!
Yes!\. It splendid!\. Now we can do repairs and leave sandy sharkplace!
Yes, but there one problem.\. To repair engine, platform needs restart.\. Including shield.
Oh no.\. Then monsters can attack precious cargo!
\v[lore.title.seeker] we need more help.\. Please also protect transport for time needed to restart.
Yes, yes.\. Please help.\. It only around 2 minutes!
Good, good!\. Please prepare for protection and talk again, when ready!
Good, we starting repairs then.\. Please protect crate till shield is back!
\v[lore.title.seeker] be ready!\. Angry bone creatures come near!
Fine, come back when ready.\. Please return soon!
Yes, please not leave \v[lore.title.shad] in coarse sand much longer.
Human please bring \c[3]\v[item.190.name]\c[0] from town market!
Also \c[3]\v[item.186.name]\c[0]!\. And \c[3]\v[item.177.name]\c[0] from plants in this desert!
Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], defend us from mean sharks!
Boss be angry when he sees damage...
\v[lore.title.seeker], crate get unstable!\. No more hit, please!
Use body to protect, if must!

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: So you see...\. We had this team meeting today.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: And everyone was supposed to do their work before then.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: The thing is, I didn't know about it.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320
EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: They DID send me a message about the meeting, you see?

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: So guess what happened: it ended up as spam!

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: Of course I wouldn't see it. Who checks their spam on a regular basis, oui?

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320
EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320
EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: So long story short...\. I missed the meeting today.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: I slept in, arrived too late...\. Meeting was already over.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: One of my team members saw me and asked me where I'd been.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: So I just told her...\. I played CrossWorlds.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: She got so angry, I tell you!

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: Lecturing me about how life is not all about fun and games.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: Seriously, had I known about that stupid meeting I would have shown up.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: But non! I play games so I must be a child and irresponsible.

text.en_US: Well... of course I promised I'd do my part as soon as possible.

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: But I was so mad... No way I could concentrate on work.
Greetings there, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I have been waiting for your arrival.
If the instructions on that tablet are correct, the place we have been searching should be somewhere near.
Use your Analysis to examine the walls in the area, to find it and search for a mechanism in the rock.
The entrance to the Ancient place should be somewhere around here.
Look for high walls and use your Analysis to find it.
Enter the cave, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I will follow you, as soon as I examined the surroundings for Ancient traces!
\v[lore.title.seeker], excellent work!\. This must be the entrance!
But we are far from done here.\. The truly exciting part should be inside.
Go ahead and search for a way to the inner sanctum.\. I will follow after examining the entrance mechanism.
Easy! Go look for \c[3]statue\c[0] in home village, \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0]!
Village very close! Human just need to go \c[3]west\c[0].

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: So I thought, gotta play some CrossWorlds. Let off some...

desc: EventTrigger Emilie Rant START IF plot.line >= 4320

text.en_US: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Time good for appearing.\. I in hurry and run now.\. Bye!
You just had to come along and mess with the order in this place, didn't you.
You fancy heroes don't seem to understand how things work.
We humans are the ones running the place!\. Building roads, protecting the settlements... keeping civilization.\.
We should just take what we need.\. And you won't stop me, \v[lore.title.seeker] or not!
Let me teach you some rules of the world I kept running.
Come on, be a good, simple citizen and pay the toll. It is needed for your protection.
But human guard. Taxes get paid and rest trademoney is needed for life.
We need that money to properly keep the peace you need for your profitable business. So just pay up.
This not justice. Not fair. Such scandal!
I am justified to \c[5]take it by force\c[0]. Don't make me repeat myself!
You... you sure learned some fancy tricks at \v[lore.title.seeker]-academy, eh?
Well... as for us old-fashioned guards... we only learned to uphold justice and honesty.
But we also deal with a lot of shady trickery, so\..\..\..
I already introduced myself before, right?
Well... I know \c[3]C'tron\c[0] is a bit strange. You can also call me \c[3]Toby\c[0] if you like.
Or \c[3]Tronny\c[0]. That's what all the guild members call me.
Drat! You can't speak! I forgot again!
I'm so sorry. I tend to be a bit of an airhead sometimes.
Too bad, I didn't have the chance to meet her yet.
Did you already finish that \c[3]Maroon Tree Quest\c[0]?
So how about we do that quest together? Sounds good?
I-I mean...\. of course there is no reason to rush.
We could do a couple other quests first or just explore.\. Whatever you prefer.
You and C'tron decided to explore Maroon Valley and solve the \c[3]Maroon Tree Defender\c[0] quest together.
I will never let you have them.

desc: EventTrigger coinCheck START IF tmp.bossInSection && map.bossCoins <= 0

text.en_US: You even saw through my holographic hidden entrance?\. Truly you \v[lore.title.seeker]s are something else.
But this will be the end of the line for you.\. No one will beat me, when I am this well prepared.\.\. Behold...!
D-damn it.\. All those preparations... done for nothing.
You are coming with me, traitor!\. You are a stain on the honor of the Ba'kii Guard!
Ah, hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You have done well in apprehending him.\. Now we will bring him to justice.
What, you?\. I was your superior and that is how you show your respect?
I am a guard of \v[area.heat-village.name] and sworn to protect shad- and humankind from evil.\. Like you, traitor.
I see...\. the guard truly has become soft.
...don't think you've seen the last of me!\. My human ingenuity will always find a way!
We will see about that.\. For now you will be under arrest.\. Now move it!
Yes, yes.\. Whatever you say, officer.
\v[lore.title.seeker], we are still working on preparing the next expedition to the inside.
Our leader will tell you when we can continue.\. I can't wait for what lies beyond those sands!
\v[lore.title.seeker], this is amazing!\. Surely the greatest discovery since the opening of the \v[area.heat-dng.name]!
Yes, it might not look like much.\. In fact it gives an impression of being a dead-end.
... and the nature of the sand...\. it all hints to a hidden way into a deep sanctuary of Ancient nature.
Yes, it is so very exciting!\. Now sadly...
... the mechanism seems to be unusable to us right now.
To find a way inside, we will need to examine this place and properly integrate it into Trackwalker.
Yes, this will take some time to finish.\. But we have already made great progress today.\. Amazing job, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
You can now return to HQ and leave this to us.\. Send my regards to the leader, yes?
Thank you for deciding to use the \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0], the ideal choice for mining, demolition, pest-control and passionate festivities!
This highly-advanced machine is programmed to follow its user after activation and dispenses explosive devices (also known as \c[3]"bombs"\c[0]) after being hit with a \c[3]charged range attack\c[0].
When reloading and generally not dispensing "bombs" it will try to evade the movements of its user with highly refined movement algorithms.
It can be manually deactivated again at this console or automatically return to the idle-state when the user leaves the space of operation (for example: a cave).
WARNING: Keep stored in dry and cool locations. Should only be used by trained personnel. Keep far away from children and dogs.
\c[3]Defend the tree for 2 minutes\c[0] for the salve to take effect!
Salve lost effect. The sickness returned!

\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again

desc: EventTrigger quest_traders-defense_end START IF tmp.quest_traders-defense_started && timers.quest_defense-timer.remainingTime <= 0

text.en_US:
O hai Lea.
Kill all the evil robots to leave The Room.
This is just some Test task!
Guys, check out cool message system I came up with!
I'm not even sure what I'm doing here!
Make sure to hit those enemies with balls.
Welcome stranger. Good luck with this and remember: Cloudy drink kills frog!
I know you can hear me! Where is he?!
Shizuka, I have to ask you to leave.
So, you're keeping him here? What do you think you are doing?!
Time is running short. We don't have a choice!
So you abduct a dying person and let him work until his last breath? Is that it?!
I will go and talk some sense into him! Don't get in my way!
I know you can hear me! Where is he?!
Shizuka, I have to ask you to leave.
So, you're keeping him here? What do you think you are doing?!
Time is running short. We don't have a choice!
So you abduct a dying person and let him work until his last breath? Is that it?!
I am going to talk some sense into him! Don't get in my way!
What do you think you are doing?!
You are in no condition to do this kind of work now!
All you should do is rest...
... Why should I rest when I'm way beyond recovery?
I need to finish this work. It's my final task.
... I told you about the agreement.
I finish this and they will let you go...
I'm so sorry I got you involved in this.
Just promise me...\. that you will...\. get away...
I'm sorry but I can't let you go any further.
You will have to do better than that.
I'm sorry but I can't let you go any further.
You will have to do better than that.
You know this is what he wants as well!
Sure, you'd like to think that!
You know this is what he wants as well!
Sure, you'd like to think that!
You don't know when to stop, do you?
You can throw as many enemies at me as you like.
The level threshold doesn't exactly work in your favor.
If you interrupt him, all of his hard work will be lost.\. Don't do this!
So?\. It never should have happened in the first place!
You don't know when to stop, do you?
You can throw as many enemies at me as you like.
The level threshold doesn't exactly work in your favor.
If you interrupt him, all of his hard work will be lost.\. Don't do this!
So?\. It never should have happened in the first place!
Welcome to \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0], the bustling city inside the jungle!

Well, somewhat "bustling". 
Basin Keep is still unfinished!

Expect \c[3]more NPCs\c[0], \c[3]additional maps\c[0] to the east and west, and \c[3]accessible interior\c[0] in future versions!
I see, another Seeker has arrived.
I ask you to excuse the rather unfortunate weather. Sadly, this is the norm in our city.
I just wish they'd finally finish the construction of the building to my back.
Anyway!\. Surely you're seeking passage to the \c[3]Ancient Temples of the jungle\c[0], correct?
Your destination is \c[3]Grand Krys’kajo\c[0], located in the \c[3]northern part of the jungle\c[0].
Please mind the \c[3]powerplant\c[0] right next to the temple complex.
It is the major power source of our city.
It should pose no obstacle to your task, so all we ask you is to leave it intact.
Excellent! I wish you the best for your adventures!
You will find the temples of \c[3]Grand Krys’kajo\c[0] in the \c[3]north of the jungle\c[0]. Good luck!
I am the \c[3]Boosi Man\c[0]!\. I'm doing business in this town, you see?
And I just happen to be looking for some kind souls to help me!
See, I'm about to start a new...\. attraction in this town.
But alas, I am in grave trouble!\. What I am missing is \c[3]\v[item.320.name]\c[0].
It's something you can only find outside in the jungle.\. A place that I am unable to visit!
Well, I got my reasons and they are very legitimate.
So, do you have some free time to help big ol' me?
They wander about in the \c[3]infested Jungle\c[0] to the \c[3]northeast\c[0]!
I require those flames!\. They are essential for...\. decoration!
Well then!\. Let's work together to create the next big thing of Basin Keep!
That is too bad!\. You see, my business could very well be the next big thing!
You definitely want to be a part of it!\. Talk to me when you change your mind, tiny one!
They wander about in the \c[3]infested Jungle\c[0] to the \c[3]northeast\c[0]!
I require those flames!\. They are essential for...\. decoration!
Well then!\. Let's work together to create the next big thing of Basin Keep!
I see you collected the flames!
Terrific!\. Things are almost ready, then.
The only thing we need to do, is a \c[3]test run\c[0]!
Tiny one, can I count on your help once again?
Spooktacular!\. I'll be inside constructing everything!\. It will only take the ghost of a second.
Just follow me inside when you're ready!
There was a HOLE here. It's gone now.
The tension between Humans and Shad around here is bad as it is.
It really doesn't help that the Major is acting so selfish.
I was born in \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0], a small village in the south east of Gaia's Garden.
But I spend a large amount of time with humans.
Anyway, let's not dwell for too long, my village is in danger!
You see, our village got attacked by \c[3]strange black cats\c[0].
They've already pushed us out of the north side.
It's because of this power plant... It is disrupting the ancient track and is punishing us for it.
And my people are not happy.
They are ready to fight if and I fear the worst if we don't do something.
I'm sure if we can drive these beasts away the Shad will calm down, but we have to act fast!
Let's first meet in \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]. There is a landmark in the \c[3]eastern part of the village\c[0].
Oh, you already unlocked it? Let's not waste time then!
As said, the village is in the south east of the jungle.
The humans put up way-markers so it should be easy to find.
Hey girl, ya looking for some rare weapons?
Really? This is a once in a life time offer, ma girl!
I'm just a simple trader looking for a particular \c[3]Drill\c[0]...
Well look at you, young one.
Found yourself something rare with that \c[3]\v[item.90.name]\c[0].
I could upgrade it for you if you want...
I only need certain items for it.
It has been a while since I hold this in my hands.
Thank you young girl. It is time for me to go.
Maybe we will meet again, I can still sense a greater power in this weapon.
If you change your mind, do not hesitate to return.
The \c[3]Pack\c[0] might have let you in, but that doesn't mean I have to sell you anything, Seeker.
A seeker inside here? You sure must have some good connections.
This is a private party \c[3]Seeker\c[0], you better run off\..\..\.. fast.
Unless you got yourself a pass of course.
What's this? A pass? From the Boss himself?
I don't know what you did \c[3]Seeker\c[0], but rules are rules.
Sorry \c[3]Seeker\c[0], the market is closed off for your kinda folks.
Unless you got yourself a pass, of course.
Now look at that. You got yourself a Pass. From the man himself.
Make sure to leave lots of cash, alright?
Have fun, \c[3]Seeker\c[0], and don't lose the pass.
The rain will cleanse your soul.
What's up with this part of town?
Well, apparently this used to be the workers' quarters back when the power plant was built.
But it became a slum after most of the traders and the general businesses moved in.
Wow, alright. Kinda makes you sad, don't ya think?
Don't you think it's strange that we don't take damage from the rain?
I think it's strange that you're sitting on the wet floor.
But yes, it is weird. It's pouring down and I feel the rain, but no damage.
I guess it's some kind of game development magic again.
A Seeker? Should I ask her? Guess she's as good as anyone, really.
Hey, ya looking to make some quick cash?
My Dad wants me to collect some goods for him from the infested jungle region.
But I ain't no fighter or collector. Dunno why he thinks this is a good "entry trial" too.
So, ya in or out? Ain't got all day.
Good, then let's get down to business.
I need ya to get me 10 \c[3]Venom Shrooms\c[0] and 5 \c[3]Glowing Spheres\c[0], gotcha?
Good, good. Come back when ya got them. And make it quick, ya hear?
Buzz of then, I'll find someone to do the work for me.
Still here? Doesn't look like ya got my goods. Go on then, make it quick.
Oh it's you. Ya finally got my goods?
Well, about time I might say, woman.
Alright, that's all I need. Here's your cash. Nice knowing ya, I guess.
Can't do this for dad. Ain't no fighting in me...
"Note to myself - Visit \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] and enter the caves to drill"
Tiny one, it seems you already had \c[3]great fun\c[0] in Pumpkin Land!
Now it's time for the \c[3]grand finale\c[0]!
BUGS! WHY DOES IT HAVE TO BE BUGS?!
THEY COULD HAVE JUST THROWN MORE PUMPKINS AT US!
NO, IT HAS TO BE BUGS!
KILL THEM! KILL THEM WITH FIRE!
NO WAIT! ICE! KILL THEM WITH ICE!

desc: EventTrigger wave3 START IF tmp.spawnWave >=2 && map.bugsKilled >= 18

text.en_US: Well I sure had plenty of fun, tiny one!
It's hard enough to haunt anybody in this city, with everyone so busy.
So I knew I had to aim for something big, start a proper... boosiness!
It's the only way to get any attention these days.
Well, I sure call this a success!\. Thanks a lot for your participation, tiny one!
Great fun I had, oui. And I thought I was safe from these things past the Temple Mine.
Sorry Lady, ain't selling stuff to \c[3]Seekers\c[0] unless the boss tells me to.
Boss tells me I gotta sell you the \c[3]One Up\c[0]. Dunno why, but here you go.
Go down if you want to talk to the Boss, \c[3]Seeker\c[0].
You there \c[3]Seeker\c[0]. Blue Hair, Spheromancer, horns.
Da Boss tells us of a woman we are to look out for. You fit the description.
You recently helped a certain \c[3]Mick\c[0], right?
Good. In that case I must ask you to go down the stairs and meet the boss.
A no is not acceptable I'm afraid.
There's nothing you have to worry about. Please come with me.
I assure you there is nothing for you to be afraid of.
In fact, I invited you here to thank you.
My men tell me you helped my boy here.
Gathering precious resources from the perilous infested parts of the jungle.
A great feat I might say. Even when he was to gather them himself.
Ah come on, Dad. I did it all by myself, I swear.
Shut it, boy. It is bad enough you have brought shame on yourself and the family.
What you did for my son showed me you have great potential.
Potential that we could use for a little problem.
You see, our family runs a business that is vital to this humble part of the city.
Many citizens require the processed substance procured from mushrooms found in the infested jungle.
The health concerns of my people are just as important to me as the ones of my own family.
We sell this medicine for cheap, thanks to our own trading route.
But let us say that this route is... not official.
Recently the \c[3]High Trader Council\c[0] breached our route which led to an obvious shortage of medicine for our poor people.
Guards now patrol part of the route.
Finding another route would just bring more guards on us eventually, so another solution must be found.
And with you, I think we might just have found one.
Your \c[3]Seeker Skills\c[0] should allow you to find paths where none were before, am I not right?
Yes, I think so too! Now what if instead of trying to find a new route, we smuggle the goods past the guards?
The fine guards would do their honest work and we would do ours. No one gets hurt.
Of course this favor would not come without reward.
I'm sure you already noticed that \c[3]Outsiders\c[0] are not allowed to enter our trade hubs here in \c[3]Pond Slums\c[0]?
If you agree to help us, I will personally grant you a pass allowing you entrance to our trade hubs.
So what do you say? Are you willing to help us in these most desperate of times?
Now, the trading route I spoke of runs below the city, starting right here in the basement and going all the way to the infested jungle.
I want you and my son to go to the infested jungle entrance and find a way past the guards.
What? I have to go with her?
You will do as I say, do you understand?
Meet my son at \c[3]Lost Lookout\c[0] in the infested jungle. He knows the secret entrance.
He will give you a \c[3]special chip\c[0] which allows us to track the path you took, so don't worry about jotting everything down.
Off you go then, for the good of the people.
Now how unfortunate. However I do understand your position.
If you ever change your mind, please visit me.
As said dear \c[3]Seeker\c[0], go find my son in Lost Lookout in the infested part of the jungle.
He will guide you towards the rest.
I have already received word from my son.
Splendid work! Now all we need is the tracker chip and we can get right back to procuring the mushrooms.
With this we can finally start our production again and help the dear sick people.
The Calzone Family will be forever in your debt.
As promised, a pass to our trader hubs is your reward.
I hope our wares will be to your liking.
I will also advise our own cashier upstairs to sell our product to you.
May it aid you in battle as it eases the pain of the people of Pond Slums.
Our production is running along just fine, all thanks to you.
The Boss is just around the corner to the left.
Sorry Lady, ain't selling stuff to \c[3]Seekers\c[0] unless the boss tells me to.
Go down if you want to talk to the Boss, \c[3]Seeker\c[0].
Please \c[3]enter the teleporter\c[0] to start your ride!
Please \c[3]enter the teleporter\c[0] to start your ride!

\c[3]GF\c[0]: Items N' Goods
\c[3]1F\c[0]: Basin Arsenal
\c[3]2F\c[0]: Umbrella Inc.
Welcome! Find all our vending goods here but with a personal touch.
Hello, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Need some equipment on this rainy day?
I'm sorry dear customer but Umbrella Inc. is currently experiencing a \..\..\.. sort of outbreak.
In order to avoid any residents from getting inf... \.\.\.from having a bad time, we have closed off access to the third floor.
Are you going to be done anytime soon?
We spent like 30 minutes here, just take the stronger one.
But the stronger one looks worse...
What are you talking about? You know equipment doesn't change your appearance.
But why does it look different in the shelf then?
Because it's more fancy? What do I know.

\c[3]GF\c[0]: Quest Hub
\c[3]1F\c[0]: Majors Office
\c[3]2F\c[0]: Business
\c[3]3F\c[0]: More Business
\c[3]4F\c[0]: Serious Business
Seeker? Isn't there some wild people you need to help?
Look who it is. I already heard of you heroic deed.
Thanks for that, now the power plant is accessible to my people again.
You have to listen to me, Mayor Sullyvan.
You again? If you want to speak to me, please make an appointment.
This is an emergency! Things are about to escalate!
I’m so sorry Sir, she just bursted in...
It’s okay Penny, this seems... important.
The village of \c[3]V'rda\c[0] is currently under attack by dangerous creatures. We've already lost the entire north of the village.
Oh. I'm very sad to hear that. But how does this concern us in any way?
You see... The Shad are \c[3]blaming the power plant\c[0].
Well, of course! They always do. And I always tell them the same thing:
the power plant is fine. We make sure it's all in perfect harmony with your oh-so-holy track.
Please listen. Things are not the same! We are desperate.
The Shad now started a protest in front of the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] as we speak.
They want to stop the power plant and are ready to use force.
What? You Shad want to use force? With sticks and stones? Don't make me laugh!
I know you hold little respect for us, but I beseech you, don't let this end in a blood bath!
What choice do I have? You know as well as I do that we depend on the power plant.
We can't simply turn it off.
I'm very much aware. What you can do is help us free the village from those creatures.
If you do, things might calm down again. A few of your guards should suffice...
You wild people come around with your petty problems and I'm supposed to spare some guards for you...
Speaking of annoyances! What's that \c[3]Seeker \c[0]doing back there?
Oh! I didn't even see you there.
If you need somebody to deal with your “creatures”, I’m sure a Seeker like this will do the job!
If you want to access the dungeon to the north, it's in your interest to resolve this dispute quickly, right?
Please Seeker, we're in dire need of any help.
The Seeker can do her thing and everybody will be happy.
I now see you hold little respect for Seekers as well.
My job here is to run a city in middle of a dense jungle!
I don’t have time for wild people and adventurers.
You two do what you need to do to solve your problems.
And make sure you free the passage to the power plant soon or I will become another problem for you.
Now if you'd please excuse me!
Meet me outside Seeker, I'll tell you everything I know.
I've had enough of his arrogance.

\c[3]GF\c[0]: Quest Hub
\c[3]1F\c[0]: Majors Office
\c[3]2F\c[0]: Business
\c[3]3F\c[0]: More Business
\c[3]4F\c[0]: Serious Business
I'm sorry Seeker, but thanks to this noisy Shad I have my hands full with re-scheduling.
Hello Seeker, the Major is free if you want to visit him.
Cool, thanks to this weird Shad I now have to wait for my appointment with the mayor.
