One has proven the mastery of Shock and Wave.
Yet this was not one's final challenge.
I will meet this one again!
Now it is time for one to take another challenge...
\s[2]... for one to fight another master of Shock and Wave!
One has reached the very top of Grand Krys'kajo.
Standing high above the earth, one is now ready.
One has fully ascended Krys'kajo and shown true mastery of Shock and Wave.

You just completed \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0], the final dungeon of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].

For now, these are all the dungeons we have for you. Future updates will now focus in extending the \c[3]story\c[0] again!
Hello Human! You defeated mighty whale and ape! I am here to hand you \c[3]Shiny Thing\c[0] as a reward!
They told me later you will not have me here handing Shiny Thing, but \c[3]proper scene\c[0]. No idea what that means!
With this shiny thing you can enter \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] to the east of \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0]!
Another strange visitor has arrived at the roots.
One trying to reach the top of Krys'kajo as well?
One needs to prove the mastery of \c[3]Wave\c[0] and \c[3]Shock\c[0] for one to ascend.
I shall watch this one closely.
Hello Human! You defeated mighty slime! I am here to hand you \c[3]Shiny Thing\c[0] as a reward!
They told me later you will not have me here handing Shiny Thing, but \c[3]proper scene\c[0]. No idea what that means!
Now you only need to collect other Shiny Thing from \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0] to enter \c[3]Grand Krys’kajo\c[0]!
It looks like you got shiny thing from Zir'vitar Temple, too! You can now enter \c[3]Grand Krys’kajo\c[0]! Good luck, Human!

A wide-ranged spinning move hitting many nearby enemies.
Catch your enemies in a spinning saw. Powerful attack with smaller range.
A Spin Dance with more spins, hits, damage, and knockback.
Catch your enemies in a fierce air combo with massive damage.
Fire a powerful projectile that will fly through enemies.
Fire a mass of small shots in a narrow angle.
Fire a powerful projectile with wide range, flying through enemies and back to you.
Fire an even larger mass of homing shots at your target.
Dash right through your enemies, damaging everything in your way.
A very powerful attack that will hit exactly one enemy.
Dash through your enemies and ignite delayed damage spreading through nearby targets.
An extremely powerful attack that will hit exactly one enemy. A lot.
Blast away all nearby enemies, freeing up space.
Creates a damage-reducing shield, lasting for a couple of seconds.
Pull enemies towards you, only to blast them away with a fierce triple explosion.
Creates a damage-reducing shield that also damages nearby enemies for several seconds.
Performs a fierce whirl attack, engulfing your enemies in flames.
A blazing thrust of fire piercing through enemies in front of you. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Draw in enemies with blazing fire balls and finish them with a massive fire whirl.
Lock in enemies with 2 powerful strikes followed by a flaming air combo. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
The end is here. Draw in Enemies, engulf them in an upwards fire whirl and end with blazing ground explosion. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Summon the spirit of the dragon and lock enemies in a fierce combo that ends with a fire tornado. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
A controllable blazing burst of fire that deals damage over a small area. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Jump into the air and fire a destructive laser along the direction you are facing. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Dash through your enemies while leaving a trail of fire. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Place a mine that explodes when enemies are nearby.
Surround yourself with fire and dash a long way, leaving hot damaging magma on the ground. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Dash and place multiple mines which can seek enemies when not touched.
Mark enemies by dashing through them which will be bombarded by a blazing meteor shower. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Perfect guard an attack and counter with a flaming explosion. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Creates a ring of fire around you, dealing damage to enemies walking into it.
Perfect guard an attack, jump into the air and counter with a fiery laser beam. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Create a long lasting fire circle that erupts in flaming outbursts several times.
Perfect guard an attack, lock enemies in an upwards combo and finish the of a hellish downwards laser. Causes \c[3]Burn\c[0].
Conjure forth the power of the Sun and immolate yourself in fire making melee attacks burst out in flame for short while.
Long startup time for massive damage. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Performs a stationary ice whirl attack with wide range and strong knockback.
Take a stand and do massive damage with 3 frozen stars. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Extend the Ice Twirl by sucking in enemies with multiple hits and then ejecting them.
Take a stand and conjure a massive frozen ice spear from the ground the impales enemies. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Begin a dance of multiple huge ice whirl attacks and lock enemies in and end it all with a massive pirouette that blast enemies away.
Quickly shoots a mass of icy spikes. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Hit enemies with a big snow explosion, caging them within icicles. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Shoot an icicle that bounces of walls 2 times, creating homing mini icicles. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Shoot a large snow ball, leaving an icicle trail and caging enemies with multiple icicles. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Summon an Ice Turret with spikes around you and blast your enemies away with a volley of icicles. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Dash with high speed, leaving a trail of icicles behind you, damaging enemies on contact. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Dash a long distance, leaving icicles which create multiple additional icicle trails. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Perfect guard an attack and counter with a cold strike, slowing down your enemy.
Blast enemies away and spawn several icicles in front of you, blocking projectiles and damaging enemies on contact. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Perfect guard an attack and completely freeze the enemy, leaving it open for more attacks.
Spawn multiple icicles around you an create a protective but slowing shield that hurt enemies on contact.
Perfect guard an attack, initiate a quick combo and completely freeze all enemies in front of you. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Winter is here. Summon multiple huge icicles around you and create a protective but slow barrier that hurts enemies. Causes \c[3]Chill\c[0].
Attack with a series of multiple fast spin attacks within a small radius.
Hit a single enemy into the air following up with a lightning strike. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Perform a volley of controllable spin attacks while drawing in enemies and finish off with a powerful whirl.
Lock a single enemy into a fast ground combo followed by multiple hit in the air and a strong lightning finisher. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Lock a single enemy into a hyper speed combo that creates a doppelganger and finishes with a faster-than-light attack chain. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Throw a projectile that creates a delayed lightning bolt damaging everything around it. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Shoot an array of small homing projectiles.
Fire a projectile that creates a chain along up to 4 enemies which will get hit by a lightning bolt. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Throw a shock ball that will bounce off an enemy and create a sphere that emits multiple homing projectiles.
It's hammer time. Throw a ball that chains multiple enemies together and evaporates them with a massive lightning bolt.
Call upon the help of the gods and summon 3 spheres that spam an enemy with bullets finish it off with a lightning explosion.
Perform a fast dash that attacks one enemy multiple times on contact. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Dash through enemies leaving a shocking trail of lightning. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Dash through a single enemy multiple times at the speed of light and finish with a strong punch. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Lightning returns with a controllable chain attack of 3 dashes which hit all enemies on the path. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Stop time and pummel an enemy with an uncontrollable series of attacks, finishing off with a diving spark and balls. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Create an start and end point and dash between it multiple times automatically attacking everything in between. Causes \c[3]Jolt\c[0].
Block one attack and slow down time for everything but yourself.
Block one attack and stop time for everything but yourself.
Frontal attack with high damage, sending all hit enemies flying. Causes \c[3]Mark\c[0].
Draws enemies to the front of the player and then blasts them away with a powerful attack. Causes \c[3]Mark\c[0].
Shoots a super fast projectile penetrating a line of enemies.
Hit enemies with a swarm of projectiles absorbing its HP.
Shoots a super fast projectile that bounces between the player and a wall for several times and penetrates everything in between.
Hit an enemy with a swarm of projectiles, absorbing its HP before blasting it away with a final attack.
Charge up a sniping attack that can bounce 3 times until it hits an enemy. Each bounce increases the strength of the attack.
Siphon HP from the enemies and trade it for a huge controllable wave beam that drains your HP. Causes \c[3]Mark\c[0].
Spawns aura that pushes away nearby enemies for several seconds.
Block one attack and regenerate part of the blocked damage.
Spawns aura that pushes away nearby enemies and throws projectiles for several seconds.
Block all attacks for a few seconds and regenerate part of the blocked damage.
Enter critical mode but become invincible. Absorb any enemy attack for a short time. The more absorbed the larger the ending explosion and the more HP healed.
Dash with high speed, damaging and stunning enemies along the way. Causes \c[3]Mark\c[0].
Dash away and leave behind a decoy distracting your foes.
Dash through enemies at high speed and draw them into your trail behind you before causing a powerful explosion. Causes \c[3]Mark\c[0].
Dash away and leave behind a deadly decoy that distracts and damages your foes. Causes \c[3]Mark\c[0].
Charge up by creating a Vortex behind you and blast off leaving behind a huge wave explosion.
Dash through and create 4 decoys that pummel an enemy multiple times ending with a combined wave attack. Causes \c[3]Mark\c[0].
